snippet: A senior Yemeni intelligence officer was shot dead on Monday by suspected al-Qaeda militants and an army general escaped a separate ambush in eastern Yemen, security sources said....

headline.print_headline: Yemeni Intelligence Officer Killed, General Escapes in Ambushes
headline.main: Yemeni Intelligence Officer Killed, General Escapes in Ambushes

lead_paragraph: A senior Yemeni intelligence officer was shot dead on Monday by suspected al-Qaeda militants and an army general escaped a separate ambush in eastern Yemen, security sources said.
